channel.title: CVE Feed for ZTE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZTE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-25643|2024-08-02T11:25:19.324Z -- zte -- mc801a
item.description: There is a command injection vulnerability in some ZTE mobile internet products. Due to insufficient input validation of multiple network parameters, an authenticated attacker could use the vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2023-25644|2024-08-02T11:25:19.386Z -- zte -- mc801a
item.description: There is a denial of service vulnerability in some ZTE mobile internet products. Due to insufficient validation of Web interface parameter, an attacker could use the vulnerability to perform a denial of service attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-25647|2024-08-02T11:25:19.245Z -- zte -- some%20zte%20mobile%20phones
item.description: There is a permission and access control vulnerability in some ZTE mobile phones. Due to improper access control, applications in mobile phone could monitor the touch event.

item.title: CVE-2023-25650|2024-08-02T11:25:19.352Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is an arbitrary file download vulnerability in ZXCLOUD iRAI. Since the backend does not escape special strings or restrict paths, an attacker with user permission could access the download interface by modifying the request parameter, causing arbitrary file downloads.

item.title: CVE-2023-25651|2024-08-02T11:25:19.271Z -- zte -- mobile%20internet%20products
item.description: There is a SQL injection vulnerability in some ZTE mobile internet products. Due to insufficient input validation of SMS interface parameter, an authenticated attacker could use the vulnerability to execute SQL injection and cause information leak.

item.title: CVE-2023-25642|2024-08-02T11:25:19.252Z -- zte -- mc801a
item.description: There is a buffer overflow vulnerability in some ZTE mobile internet producsts. Due to insufficient validation of tcp port parameter, an authenticated attacker could use the vulnerability to perform a denial of service attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-25649|2024-08-02T11:25:19.250Z -- zte -- mf286r
item.description: There is a command injection vulnerability in a mobile internet product of ZTE. Due to insufficient validation of SET_DEVICE_LED interface parameter, an authenticated attacker could use the vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2023-25648|2024-08-02T11:25:19.340Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a weak folder permission vulnerability in ZTE's ZXCLOUD iRAI product. Due to weak folder permission, an attacker with ordinary user privileges could construct a fake DLL to execute command to escalate local privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-22064|2024-08-01T22:35:34.708Z -- zte -- zxun-epdg
item.description: ZTE ZXUN-ePDG product, which serves as the network node of the VoWifi system, under by default configuration, uses a set of non-unique cryptographic keys during establishing a secure connection(IKE) with the mobile devices connecting over the internet . If the set of keys are leaked or cracked, the user session informations using the keys may be leaked.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-08-01T22:35:34.788Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-07-09T06:41:07.828Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-25646|2024-06-20T06:20:44.058Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h388x
item.description: There is an unauthorized access vulnerability in ZTE H388X. If H388X is caused by brute-force serial port cracking,attackers with common user permissions can use this vulnerability to obtain elevated permissions on the affected device by performing specific operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-22064|2024-06-04T17:52:44.293Z -- zte -- zxun-epdg
item.description: ZTE ZXUN-ePDG product, which serves as the network node of the VoWifi system, under by default configuration, uses a set of non-unique cryptographic keys during establishing a secure connection(IKE) with the mobile devices connecting over the internet . If the set of keys are leaked or cracked, the user session informations using the keys may be leaked.

item.title: CVE-2023-25646|2024-06-26T20:10:48.349Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h388x
item.description: There is an unauthorized access vulnerability in ZTE H388X. If H388X is caused by brute-force serial port cracking,attackers with common user permissions can use this vulnerability to obtain elevated permissions on the affected device by performing specific operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-07-09T14:49:04.602Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-25646|2024-08-02T11:25:19.252Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h388x
item.description: There is an unauthorized access vulnerability in ZTE H388X. If H388X is caused by brute-force serial port cracking,attackers with common user permissions can use this vulnerability to obtain elevated permissions on the affected device by performing specific operations.
